title: My ping suddenly is at 200-400 when it's usually at 75
body: My ping randomly jumped up starting today. Idk what to do since it's usually at 70-75. I even set my priority for LOL to high in the task manager and nothing changed.

replies.body:
Huge changes in latency (ping) are typically a result of routing changes by your ISP that cause your connection to take a longer path to the servers. Before we take a close look at your network routing, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can confirm there aren't any local settings exacerbating this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any changes in your latency.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IMIRgIHb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-20T02:32:21.882+0000)
>
> Huge changes in latency (ping) are typically a result of routing changes by your ISP that cause your connection to take a longer path to the servers. Before we take a close look at your network routing, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so we can confirm there aren't any local settings exacerbating this issue.
> 
> Let me know if those steps caused any changes in your latency.

Thanks, the connection guide helped me stabilize my ping back to normal at 75. Happy Holidays.

Hi! 
Can you tell me what have u done to fix it? THanks!
